head.title: Fourth Test of Module 22 of CSS3 Spec

body.h1: Testing Fourth Testable Statement of Module 22 of CSS3 Specification

ul.li: 4. The accessibility functionality is available to CSS3.

body.p: If statement #4 above is passed, then this paragraph should be in the initial containing block and navy. The rule applied is "#body1 {position: absolute; left: 70px; top: 70px }". "#body1" is applied to "BODY" and "#p1" is applied to "p". Also "#p1 {color: navy}".

This emphasized text (blue) covers the first two sentences of the paragraph. Rules are "#em1 {color: blue}", "#strong1 {color: yellow}", and "#p2 {color: green}".
This strong text is yellow. This part of paragraph should be green. "#em1" is applied to "em", "#p2" is applied to "p", and "#strong1" is applied to "strong".
All other properties of this page should be UA-default.
